messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] to Shyrley (was Crystal,	Conference!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: Or on the Raffle. ;-) I can t wait to see all the neat stuff. Barb E Ideas are elusive, slippery things.  Best to keep a pad of paper and a pencil at your
messages.messageBody:
Or on the Raffle. ;-) I can't wait to see all the neat stuff.

Barb E
"Ideas are elusive, slippery things. Best to keep a pad
of paper and a pencil at your bedside, so you can stab
them during the night before they get away."

- Earl Nightingale, Speaker and Businessman

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] to Shyrley (was Crystal,  Conference!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thanks, Kelly!!  I knew you d get this straightened out!  :-) Marji
messages.messageBody:
At 21:05 8/12/03 -0400, Kelly wrote:
>OK. Done.

Thanks, Kelly!! I knew you'd get this straightened out! :-)

Marji

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] to Shyrley (was Crystal, Conference!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/11/2003 4:12:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... OK. Done. Shyrley, YOU are already registered for Thursday AND Sunday (just in case---call
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/11/2003 4:12:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
marji@... writes:


> Wait a minute. Did you have an existing reservation at the conference rate
>
> and they wouldn't extend it one night earlier at the conference
> rate?? Ulp! I hope that's not what they're doing. If that is the case,
> perhaps Kelly can talk to her contact at the hotel and make sure that the
> conference rate will apply for folks to extend the reservations one night.
>
> I mean *really*. :-(
>

OK. Done.

Shyrley, YOU are already registered for Thursday AND Sunday (just in
case---call of you want to get rid of Sunday) at $79.00.

If anyone, who already has reservations, would like another night @ $79.00
and the front desk won't give it to you, ask to be connected to Ken Ivey. He
will straighten it out for you.

There's nothing I can do for those who are booking or have booked rooms after
the cut-off. I'm sorry.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] to Shyrley (was Crystal, Conference!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/11/2003 4:12:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Working on it, working on it. I ll let you know tomorrow. ... Thanks, Marji. I hope it s
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/11/2003 4:12:47 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
marji@... writes:


> Wait a minute. Did you have an existing reservation at the conference rate
>
> and they wouldn't extend it one night earlier at the conference
> rate?? Ulp! I hope that's not what they're doing. If that is the case,
> perhaps Kelly can talk to her contact at the hotel and make sure that the
> conference rate will apply for folks to extend the reservations one night.


Working on it, working on it. I'll let you know tomorrow.


> All that other stuff though, Shyrley, will be fun! You won't believe how
> cool everyone is at this conference. It won't be at all like the crummy
> experience you've had of this weird country so far. Folks won't look at
> you sideways, and they won't judge you for being who you are. And, they're
> all kind to their kids, and the kids are respected and watched over by all
> the folks. I'm writing all this from memory, and believe me, it was even
> better than I'm writing about.

Thanks, Marji. I hope it's just as amazing this year!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Crystal, Conference!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Shyrley, I also have that reluctance to leave yet I can t wait too!  I am so excited to meet everyone, and find out more more more LOL.  The kids are all
messages.messageBody:
Shyrley, I also have that reluctance to leave yet I can't wait too! I am so excited to meet everyone, and find out more more more LOL. The kids are all getting excited too. Stepheny
----- Original Message -----
From: Shyrley
To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 11, 2003 4:01 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Crystal, Conference!!!!




Stepheny Cappel wrote:

>I got it. I'm getting ridiculously excited LOL Steph
>
>
I was excited, now I have the 'reluctance to leave nest' feeling plus
nervousness at drive and all them new people :-(
I managed to book a room Thurs night at the hotel so me n Marji will be
at this dinner but I failed to get the conference rate. I daren't tell
DH as he'd flip. This means I'm going to have to leave Sunday as we
can't stretch to another hotel night :-(

Shyrley

messages.subject: [Unschooling-Discussion] to Shyrley (was Crystal,  Conference!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Wait a minute.  Did you have an existing reservation at the conference rate and they wouldn t extend it one night earlier at the conference rate??  Ulp!  I
messages.messageBody:
At 16:01 8/11/03 -0400, Shyrley wrote:
>I managed to book a room Thurs night at the hotel so me n Marji will be
>at this dinner but I failed to get the conference rate.

Wait a minute. Did you have an existing reservation at the conference rate
and they wouldn't extend it one night earlier at the conference
rate?? Ulp! I hope that's not what they're doing. If that is the case,
perhaps Kelly can talk to her contact at the hotel and make sure that the
conference rate will apply for folks to extend the reservations one night.

I mean *really*. :-(

All that other stuff though, Shyrley, will be fun! You won't believe how
cool everyone is at this conference. It won't be at all like the crummy
experience you've had of this weird country so far. Folks won't look at
you sideways, and they won't judge you for being who you are. And, they're
all kind to their kids, and the kids are respected and watched over by all
the folks. I'm writing all this from memory, and believe me, it was even
better than I'm writing about.


Marji

at this dinner but I failed to get the conference rate. I daren't tell
DH as he'd flip. This means I'm going to have to leave Sunday as we
can't stretch to another hotel night :-(

Shyrley

messages.msgSnippet: What would the actual cost be and can I bring the kids with me?  Steph ... From: marji To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, August 11, 2003
messages.messageBody:
What would the actual cost be and can I bring the kids with me? Steph
----- Original Message -----
From: marji
To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, August 11, 2003 1:57 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Crystal, Conference!!!!


Hi, Folks!

I have a spare room. I had originally reserved two rooms for Friday and
Saturday nights with two double beds in them, thinking that Ren's sister
would need a room, and now it looks like she won't need them. Please let
me know if you need the room.

Warmly,
Marji

At 12:07 8/11/03 -0400, you wrote:
>Crystal, DH just said if I can get the money up I can go, um I'm just
>brainstorming here, I don't have your address, so email me privately and
>lets see if we can get something going... Steph

> Sent: Saturday, August 09, 2003 8:50 AM
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Newbie Questions (pretty long)
>
>
> > Also, you could see (even at this late date) if anyone would be into
> > sharing a room with you.
>
> I still haven't found a roommate, so if you're interested, email me
> privately. Rooms are around $80-100 for one night. We need 2 nights with
> the cost split in half.
>
> Crystal

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Crystal, Conference!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Crystal, DH just said if I can get the money up I can go, um I m just brainstorming here, I don t have your address, so email me privately and lets see if we
messages.messageBody:
Crystal, DH just said if I can get the money up I can go, um I'm just brainstorming here, I don't have your address, so email me privately and lets see if we can get something going... Steph
----- Original Message -----
From: Crystal
To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 09, 2003 8:50 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Newbie Questions (pretty long)


> Also, you could see (even at this late date) if anyone would be into
> sharing a room with you.

I still haven't found a roommate, so if you're interested, email me
privately. Rooms are around $80-100 for one night. We need 2 nights with
the cost split in half.

Crystal
